name: Athletics
description: Represents your ability to apply physical strength effectively.

name: Intimidation
description: Represents your ability to manipulate others using your physique or physical presence.

name: Acrobatics
description: Your ability to maintain balance and agility in tricky situations, such as running across ice or balancing on a tightrope.

name: Sleight-of-Hand
description: Covers manual dexterity for tasks like pickpocketing or performing subtle tricks.

name: Stealth
description: Represents your ability to remain undetected by others.

name: Investigation
description: Represents your ability to deduce information based on clues and evidence.

name: Medicine
description: Represents your knowledge of medicinal techniques, tools, and treatments.

name: Survival
description: Represents your understanding of nature and your ability to hunt, track, or navigate the wilderness.

name: History
description: Represents your knowledge of historical events, items, places, or people.

name: Arcane
description: Represents your knowledge of magic, its uses, and techniques.

name: Religion
description: Represents your understanding of religious beliefs, customs, and traditions.

name: Occultism
description: Represents your knowledge of otherworldly creatures, dimensions, and phenomena.

name: Knowledge
description: With your GM’s permission, you can create a custom knowledge skill to specialize in a topic not covered above.

name: Insight
description: Represents your ability to read people’s intentions and emotions.

name: Persuasion
description: Represents your ability to influence others through truthful or cleverly reasoned arguments.

name: Deception
description: Represents your ability to mislead others through lies or untruths.

name: Threaten
description: Represents your ability to coerce others through intimidating or threatening language.

name: Performance
description: Represents your ability to captivate an audience through entertainment, such as music, storytelling, or other artistic displays.

name: Perception
description: Represents your awareness and ability to sense the world around you.
